RM3E01
Metroid Prime 3: Corruption

Infinite Health [brkirch]
C21C1AE0 00000003
3C8044BB 38846000
90830004 C0230004
60000000 00000000

Infinite Health (Phaaze) [brkirch]
04161568 60000000
04154888 60000000
This code also disables the Phazon increase in corrupted hypermode.

Have Infinite Missiles [brkirch]
C21BF41C 00000002
80A30088 90A30084
38A00001 00000000

Infinite Hypermode [brkirch]
04161048 4800001C
04162A8C 60000000
04162404 48000070

Moon Jump [brkirch]
C21C1AE4 00000008
3D808000 818C5000
3C80805F 80845088
558CE800 2C0C0000
40820008 5484083E
5484A000 2C040000
4182000C 3C804150
909E0180 C002A4AC
60000000 00000000
C21C2FE4 00000002
88631428 3CA08000
90655000 00000000
